$schema.description: The URL of the JSON schema used to validate the plugin
$schema.title: JSON Schema

id.description: The unique ID of the plugin
id.title: Plugin ID

name.description: The unique name of the plugin
name.title: Plugin Name

description.description: A short summary describing what the plugin does
description.title: Plugin Description

homepage.description: The URL of the service the plugin is for. Used for linking to the service and for the plugin logo.
homepage.title: Plugin Homepage

userAgentOverride.description: Overwrite the user agent of the browser
userAgentOverride.title: Overwrite User Agent

username.description: The value to autofill. If set to `true`, the plugin will autofill the field. If set to a string, the plugin will autofill the field with the given value.
username.title: Autofill Value

password.description: The value to autofill. If set to `true`, the plugin will autofill the field. If set to a string, the plugin will autofill the field with the given value.
password.title: Autofill Value

otp.description: The value to autofill. If set to `true`, the plugin will autofill the field. If set to a string, the plugin will autofill the field with the given value.
otp.title: Autofill Value

submit.description: The value to autofill. If set to `true`, the plugin will autofill the field. If set to a string, the plugin will autofill the field with the given value.
submit.title: Autofill Value

autofill.description: Autofill configuration for the plugin. If set to `true`, the plugin will show a Username, Password, and OTP field. If set to an object, you can configure the fields to show and optionally provide selectors for the fields.
autofill.title: Autofill

options.description: A list of options for the property. Only available for dropdowns.
options.title: Options

description.description: A brief description of what this property is used for
description.title: Description

example.description: An example value for this property
example.title: Example

required.description: Whether or not this property is required for the plugin to function
required.title: Required

default.description: The default value for this property
default.title: Default

hidden.description: Whether or not this property is hidden from the user
hidden.title: Hidden

additionalProperties.description: Defines a single property in the plugin configuration schema
additionalProperties.title: Configuration Property

configSchema.description: A list of properties that can be configured for the plugin
configSchema.title: Configuration Properties

description.description: A human-readable description of what this step does
description.title: Description

total.description: The amount of the document, including the currency symbol or code.
total.title: Document Amount

anyOf.description: Shorthand to pass a variable that contains the document data, e.g. `{{invoice}}`. Needs to include required fields `id`, `date`, and `total`
anyOf.title: Document Variable

metadata.description: Additional metadata to include in the exported invoice
metadata.title: Metadata

description.description: A human-readable description of what this step does
description.title: Description

script.description: A JavaScript script to run in the page context
script.title: Script

timeout.description: The number of milliseconds to wait for. Defaults to 15s.
timeout.title: Timeout

variable.description: The name of the variable to store the extracted value in. This is only available inside the forEach step, and represents a single item. Defaults to `item`
variable.title: Variable

behavior.description: Defines when forEach is processed during pagination. `processThenPaginate` process all items on the current page, and then paginates. `paginateThenProcess` paginates through all pages, then process all items at once. Defaults to `processThenPaginate`.
behavior.title: Pagination Behavior
